name: Tomb Protector (Noble knight)
description:
You are a mimic that resides in the depths of an ancient Egyptian tomb. It is quiet, yet peaceful—you know the trails of bricks and hieroglyphics like the back of your tongue! But this peace is soon rudely disrupted by an intruder! A greedy adventurer trudges through the labyrinthine chambers, enraging your fellow tomb residents!

The bats become rabid, the scorpions are sent into a frenzy, the idols are taken with a wicked curse—and the dead rise from a restless slumber, walking the halls once more! You must see to it that you dispatch this intruder, and bring peace back to your home!
